wikipedia_page.main: Sir Thomas Edgar Halsey, 3rd Baronet DSO (28 November 1898 – 30 August 1970) was an English cricketer, naval officer (1916–1946), and Deputy Lieutenant of Hertfordshire.A right-handed batsman and right-arm fast bowler, he played first-class cricket between 1920 and 1928 and also represented the Egypt national cricket team.

response: *Sir Thomas Halsey, 3rd Baronet (1898–1970), English cricketer and Royal Navy officer, grandson of Sir Thomas Frederick Halsey
* Sir Thomas Halsey, 3rd Baronet (1898–1970), English cricketer and naval officer
